alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 30 at 10:58AM MDT until October 30 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28. * WHERE...Debeque to Silt Corridor and Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin. * WHEN...Until noon MDT today. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor
